\begin{minted}{asm}

# Stack frame information for function 'g':
# - register $a0 contains p (4)
# - register $a1 contains n (4)
# - saved reg $ra at stack offset: 0

# static data
       .data
test1:
       .asciiz "prova"
test2:
       .asciiz "stringa piu lunga"

# function prologue
       .text
       .globl  G
G:
       addiu $sp, $sp, -4
       sw    $ra, 0($sp)

# function body
       lb    $t0, ($a0)
       beq   $0, $t0, ELSE
THEN:
       addiu $a0, $a0, 1
       addiu $a1, $a1, 1
       jal   G
       j     GEPI
ELSE:
       move  $v0, $a1
       j     GEPI


# function epilogue
GEPI:
       lw    $ra, 0($sp)
       addiu $sp, $sp, 4
       jr    $ra
\end{minted}
